results.name: Square array read by antidiagonals downwards: super Patalan numbers of order 3.
comment: Generalization of super Catalan numbers of Gessel, A068555, based on Patalan numbers of order 3, A097188.
link: Thomas M. Richardson, The Super Patalan Numbers, arXiv:1410.5880 [math.CO], 2014.
Thomas M. Richardson, The Super Patalan Numbers, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 18 (2015), Article 15.3.3.
